mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: –
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Reserved for the lower transport layer.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Poll
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Low Power node to its Friend node to request any messages that it has stored for the Low Power node.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Update
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Friend node to a Low Power node to inform it about security updates.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Request
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Low Power node to the all-friends fixed group address to initiate a search for a friend.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Offer
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Friend node to a Low Power node to offer to become its friend.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Clear
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent to a Friend node to inform a previous friend of a Low Power node about the removal of a friendship.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Clear Confirm
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent from a previous friend to the Friend node to confirm that a prior friend relationship has been removed.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Subscription List Add
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent to a Friend node to add one or more addresses to the Friend Subscription List.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Subscription List Remove
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent to a Friend node to remove one or more addresses from the Friend Subscription List.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Friend Subscription List Confirm
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Friend node to confirm Friend Subscription List updates.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: Heartbeat
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a node to let other nodes determine topology of a subnet.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_REQUEST
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Path Origin or by a Directed Relay node to discover a path to a destination.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_REPLY
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Path Target or by a Directed Relay node to establish a path from a Path Origin to a Path Target.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_CONFIRMATION
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Path Origin or by a Directed Relay node to confirm that a two-way path has been established from the Path Origin to a Path Target.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_ECHO_REQUEST
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Path Origin to validate a path from the Path Origin to a destination.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_ECHO_REPLY
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Path Target in order to confirm that a path exists from a Path Origin to the destination.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: DEPENDENT_NODE_UPDATE
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a path endpoint or a Directed Relay node to notify nodes in a subnet that element addresses of a dependent node are to be added to or removed from the Forwarding Table.

mesh_transport_control_opcodes.name: PATH_REQUEST_SOLICITATION
mesh_transport_control_opcodes.description: Sent by a Directed Forwarding node or a Configuration Manager to solicit the discovery of paths toward unicast addresses, group addresses, or virtual addresses.
